text:
"Now, let's move on to the regular mail segment!
　This one is from radio name Tired Officer-san"

"It's tough not having any holidays in June......!
　......I get it! I totally get that feeling!"

......Producer-san,
is it tough without any breaks for you too?
Well, I can't work nonstop all the time

Asahi, do you not understand
because you still seem like you never get tired?

Yeah!
There are so many things I want to do
